name: Raddio
description:
Raddio is a rhythm game for NES. Choose a song, then press arrows when they pass over their respective slots, which should match the rhythm of the song.

Can be played on an online emulator here: https://nes.scardua.net/run/raddio (but it probably runs better on a local emulator)

Songs
  • "Bad Apple" - ZUN
    (FamiTracker cover by Lcsmxd)
  • "At the Price of Oblivion" - Malcolm Brown
    (FamiTracker cover by cookiefonster)

Both FamiTracker covers were slightly changed in order to work with Famitone2 engine and to avoid rounding issues when syncing the music with the arrows.

Tools used
  • FamiTracker
  • Famitone2
  • NintendulatorDX
  • Aseprite
  • NES Screen Tool
  • CA65 assembler
  • Make
  • Emacs
  • Ruby
Source

Source code is available here: https://github.com/wendelscardua/raddio
